settings.title: OUR CONTRIBUTION
settings.text: A portion of proceeds from Essential Medicina goes to support those who inspire us the most. Our focus is on education, and the organizations we support are dedicated to educating youth and preserving wisdom traditions each in their own unique setting and manner. Every year we sponsor a growing number of students' education for the entire year and whenever possible, we journey to cultivate our own relationship with these special young visionaries.

settings.heading: What makes you different
settings.subheading: Shout about your unique selling points

settings.heading: What makes you different
settings.subheading: Shout about your unique selling points

settings.richtext: Our formulations and products draw from the great and ancient medicine traditions of the East, Chinese medicine and Ayurvedic medicine, Tibetan medicine, as well as from the wisdom traditions of the three Americas, Europe, Africa, Australia and even the oceans, lakes, rivers and waterways between them.

settings.direction: 445 W El Roblar Dr. Ojai, CA 930243

settings.testimonial_text: My favorite way to use Essential Medicina is at the start of my day. I’m not a coffee drinker, but I do enjoy waking up to a warm, nourishing elixir. I stir a heaping teaspoon of Medicina in a cup of hot water with either a few drops of stevia or a 1/2 teaspoon of honey. Then I top it off with steamed hemp milk and a sprinkle of cinnamon. It’s not too strong nor too light. I find it’s the perfect companion to my morning, whether I’m reading on the porch or waking up with yoga. Yummmmmm.

I feel like my entire body starts doing the can-can when I use the Essential Medicina Adrenal Essence formula in my smoothies! It is simultaneously nourishing, restoring and energizing – incredible! I’m highly sensitive to caffeine so finding something that gives me energy and stamina without making me jittery is such a gift. You must try this stuff, it’s magic.

Using the Essential Medicina adrenal program steadily over the course of six months has brought back vitality, enthusiasm and inspiration into every cell in my body. Before I began I felt sluggish, constantly exhausted and mentally foggy – no matter how clean my diet was or how much exercise I got. After using the herbs, I have more energy than I know what to do with – and am pouring it into creative projects, my own business and living a life I love and now have the energy to pursue.

settings.title: THE CUP THAT WAKES YOU UP
settings.text:
Our current formulations are the culmination of 20+ years of clinical practice, herbal medicine making, mentorship in Functional medicine, and Doctoral level research in East-West integrative medicine.

They are the answer to the problems facing so many in the world today: 

How can I support my body to adapt to the high level of stress that is “normal” in the modern world? How can I have enough energy and focus to be amazing all day long without relying on caffeine and sugar?  How can I restore my body after a period of intense stress and burnout? And best of all: Can it be as easy and taste as good as my morning latte?

The answer to all your questions is right in your cup...Essential Medicina Tonic Lattes.
settings.author: Founder and CEO

settings.title: Our Roots
settings.text: The roots of Essential Medicina run deeper than deep, so deep in fact that there are few places on Earth to which we cannot offer our profound gratitude for their generous contribution and collaboration. Our formulations and products draw from the great and ancient medicine traditions of the East, Chinese medicine and Ayurvedic medicine, Tibetan medicine, as well as from the wisdom traditions of the three Americas, Europe, Africa, Australia and even the oceans, lakes, rivers and waterways between them.
